author: Charlotte Presensky
text: On new and redevelopment projects, how does your city coordinate the processes of the Building and Planning Departments to ensure all aspects of the development process are addressed before a CO is issued?  An example would be if the Building Department is ready to issue a CO for a big box store but the Planning Department still has outstanding concerns over certain required set-backs of the project.  Any policy example would be helpful.
title: Cordinating the work of Building and Planning Departments.
